prodNameC: 埃達堤斯水痘帶狀皰疹病毒IgM
ingredientsDesc:
MICROPLATE MT PLATE: 6 x 2 strips coated with antihuman IgM monoclonal antibodies.
CONJUGATE: monoclonal antibodies labelled with HRP, in phosphate buffer with mouse ascetic fluid, phenol 0.05% and bronidox 0.02%
POSITIVE CONTROL: diluted human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%, liquid
CUT-OFF CONTROL: diluented human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%, liquid
IgM NEGATIVE CONTROL: diluent human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%, liquid
SUBSTRATE: tetramethylbenzidine 0.26 mg/ml and hydrogen peroxide 0.01% stabilized in citrate buffer 0.05 mol/l (pH 3.8)
DILUENT 50X: proteic solution concentrated 50 times, with added phenol 0.05% and bronidox 0.02%
WASH BUFFER 10X: phosphate buffered saline, concentrated 10 times; contains Brij 0.5%
STOP SOLUTION: H2SO4 0.3 mol/l in solution
ANTIGEN: partially purified Varicella Zoster virus inactivated by treatment with Beta-propiolactone, in phosphate bu
applicantName: 美艾利爾健康股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大同區塔城街64號3樓
efficacy: 對抗人類血清中之抗水痘-帶狀皰疹病毒之IgM抗體的定性方法。
